00011 // sinc.cpp*
00012 #include "sampling.h"
00013 #include "paramset.h"
00014 // Sinc Filter Declarations
00015 class LanczosSincFilter : public Filter {
00016 public:
00017         LanczosSincFilter(float xw,
00018                           float yw,
00019                                           float t) : Filter(xw, yw) {
00020                 tau = t;
00021         }
00022         float Evaluate(float x, float y) const;
00023         float Sinc1D(float x) const;
00024 private:
00025         float tau;
00026 };
00027 // Sinc Filter Method Definitions
00028 float LanczosSincFilter::Evaluate(float x, float y) const{
00029         return Sinc1D(x * invXWidth) * Sinc1D(y * invYWidth);
00030 }
00031 float LanczosSincFilter::Sinc1D(float x) const {
00032         x = fabsf(x);
00033         if (x < 1e-5) return 1.f;
00034         if (x > 1.)   return 0.f;
00035         x *= M_PI;
00036         float sinc = sinf(x * tau) / (x * tau);
00037         float lanczos = sinf(x) / x;
00038         return sinc * lanczos;
00039 }
00040 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Filter *CreateFilter(const ParamSet &ps) {
00041         float xw = ps.FindOneFloat("xwidth", 4.);
00042         float yw = ps.FindOneFloat("ywidth", 4.);
00043         float tau = ps.FindOneFloat("tau", 3.f);
00044         return new LanczosSincFilter(xw, yw, tau);
00045 }
